body.name: EICOBOT Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 20000Pa Powerful Cordless Vacuum 6 in 1, 30Mins Long Runtime, Lightweight & Ultra-Quiet Stick Vacuum for Hardwood Floor Carpet Car Cleaning Vivid Blue
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 9 mins
features: ✨【20KPA POWERFUL SUCTION】EICOBOT cordless vacuum cleaner features a 150W motor, provides stronger suction (up to 20000pa) and lower noise, giving you a quiet and efficient cleaning experience. Easily switch from ECO to TURBO power on a button to increase suction for better capturing pet hair, cat litter, pet food, and other messes on the hardwood floor or low-pile carpet.

✨【 LONG LASTING RUNTIME DETACHABLE BATTERY】 The stick vacuum cleaner builts in a 2200mAh large capacity battery and provides 30 mins running time on Eco mode, and 18mins on Turbo mode. One-click battery replacement design allows for flexible recharging methods as well as uninterrupted cleaning for extended periods and can be revived with a spare battery (sellable separately) with a single touch.

✨【CONVENIENT CORDLESS USING】The main body of the hardwood floor vacuum weighs 3.2lb and its handle is ergonomically designed. It can be used with one hand, suitable for people of most ages. A retractable metal tube for adjusting the height can use for cleaning dust on the curtains or ceiling.

✨【5 STAGE FILTRATION & MOTORIZED LED FLOOR HEAD】This pet hair stick vacuum captures 99.99% of fine dust and has a washable and replaceable HEPA filter. With a large 1.2L dust bin, you don't need to empty it multiple times while cleaning. The rotating electric brush with its own LED light makes it easy to clean under furniture.

✨【MULTIPLE ACCESSORIES & CONVENIENT STORAGE】A10 rechargeable vacuum cordless can transform into a lightweight cordless handheld vacuum or a car vacuum. You can change the brushes to clean floors, carpets, stairs, tables, hard-to-reach crevices, curtains, and more, making it easy to use at home, in the office, or the car. Don't forget a wall-mounted tool, convenient for immediate use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: lightweight cordless vacuum cleaner This is a so lightweight cordless stick vacuum cleaner that you can operate with one hand. High Efficiency Cordless Vacuum Cleaner 20000PA suction power, high efficiency cordless vacuum cleaner perfect for hard floors, wooden floors, marble floors, carpets, pet hair, dust, car.

New Upgraded Version EICOBOT A10 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner in 2023 THE MOST CONVENIENT: It is cordless, so you don't have to worry about tangled wires. Pick it up and use it, and cordless vacuum cleaner can also be transformed into a handheld vacuum stick cleaner.POWERFUL AND LIGHTWEIGHT: This lightweight vacuum cordless(main body) only weighs 3.2 lbs, yet has an amazing 20,000PA of suction.REMOVABLE BATTERY: With the push of a button, the removable, replaceable battery provides up to 30 minutes of steady, powerful power to clean your entire house! (30 minutes in standard mode, 18 minutes in strong mode).HEPA FILTER: Vacuum cleaner pet hair,high-performance 5-layer filter captures 99.99% of particles as small as 0.3 microns.LED LIGHTS: The brush head with 3 LED lights can move left and right at any angle, making it easy to clean even under beds and sofas.

EICOBOT A10 cordless vacuum cleaner with a 5-stage fully sealed cyclone filtration system captures 99.99% of dust particles as small as 0.1micro.With both a high-efficiency HEPA filter and a high-density mesh filter combined, the whole filtration performance is 2x that of the normal filter.

EICOBOT HIGH EFFCIENCY STICK CORDLESS VACUUM CLEANER IS POWERFUL Brush With Led Lights The cordless stick vacuum cleaner with 3 LED lights can move left and right at any angle, making it easy to clean even under beds and sofas. 1.2L Large Dust Cup This lightweight vacuum cleaner is equipped with a 1.2L large dust cup, which can be used to empty the dust with one button without dirty hands. 3 Charging Methods The cordless vacuum cleaner high efficiency has 3 charging modes. The removable battery can also be removed for charging. Adjustable telescopic rod The quiet corless vacuums cleaner telescoping pole is available in 12 lengths and can be easily adjusted to the user's height.

4 IN 1 CORDLESS VACUUM CLEANERS - VARIOUS APPLICATION SCENARIOS Lightweight and cordless, it offers maximum comfort and easy cleaning.Cordless vacuum cleaner with brush and long flat suction to deal with small particles, such as pet, indoor, office and car hair.
WITH A VARIETY OF VACUUM CLEANER ACCESSORIES The EICOBOT A10 Stick Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is so easy to install that an 8-year-old can install it in 2 minutes!
EICOBOT TEAM - THE BEST SERVICE FOR YOU

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and charges fast
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use and charges fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight but not heavy duty
reviews.reviewText: I'm on disability and needed some thing that I can vacuum a three-story house with out tiring myself out with the weight of a full size vacuum cleaner. I have wood floors on the first floor and got this just for the wood floors. It does an OK job, and is lightweight and doesn't make me as tired as a regular vacuum cleaner, but I don't like the fact that you have to use up the entire battery before you can recharge it, the battery doesn't last long enough for me to do the entire first floor of my home, which is about 1000 ft.², and my vacuum cleaner does a better job. I wouldn't recommend this for heavy duty cleaning, just light in between cleans. It does pick up most debris.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Does exactly what a vacuum needs to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Stopped suctioning in about a week. Terrible product. Do not date your money. Pay just a bit more for a better product because this isn’t the vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Charging cord snapped
reviews.reviewText: I had this leaning against the wall and it fell charging cord snapped in half

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Ok for very light jobs
reviews.reviewText: I was a little disappointed with this purchase, and returned my unit. It does OK for very light jobs but for very low pile runners or other type of carpeted services it just really does not do well. I didn’t feel like it was very powerful. Again, worked well for very light jobs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works good, had to apply some pressure when cleaning the carpet on my stairs. I have cats. Works perfectly on hard surfaces and fabric covered chairs
